name: Mask Off (Mask Games)
description:
MURDERER'S SPEAK:

I tried to peel the mask off my face, but it wouldn't budge - it was as if it was fused to my skin!

GAME STORY AND DESCRIPTION:

Noticing an unidentified person on the road, the sheriff follows him. However, this person lures him into the trap. Lost in a snowstorm on the mountain, the sheriff falls into a ditch and injures his foot, faints from pain. When he wakes up, he finds himself hunting game in a wooden house. As he searches around, he discovers an altar where the murderer hides human corpses. With no way out, the player must use the resources at his disposal to survive, defeat the killer, and ultimately find a way to escape.

The main goal of the game is to find the altar and burn 3 corpses, fix the car and escape. To find the altar, you first need to find an entrance with a large snowball. The game has a large area and there are gadgets everywhere. If you find a pickaxe, you can dig up the large snowball that blocks the entrance to the altar. If you find the shovel, you can find the hidden body. If you find an axe, you can enter the room where the car parts are.

ATTENTION!

Every time you cremate a corpse the killer gets angrier, so be careful :)

CONTROLS:
  • WASD to Move
  • MOUSE to Look Around
  • F to Use FlashLight
  • TAB to Open Inventory
  • LMB to Use Items
  • To Repair the Car Find All Objects and Click the Engine Side Than Spam Space.
